about_me.title: About me
about_me.paragraph_1: Hi, I'm Jose Luis Zúñiga, a software developer with expertise in Angular for the frontend and Java for the backend.
about_me.paragraph_2: I have experience in software development, including applications in computer vision (Python) for industrial automation and developing drivers for microcontrollers.
about_me.paragraph_3: I participate in different stages of software development, from gathering requirements with stakeholders, application development, testing, deployment, and maintenance

projects.title: Projects

projects.paragraph_2: Contact me to learn more about me..
